text_block_list.name: Caster
text_block_list.text: Hishi Amazon is hanging on to the very last second!

text_block_list.name: Caster
text_block_list.text: But it's Brian! Narita Brian has just won her fifth crown!

text_block_list.name: Caster
text_block_list.text:
A true match between powerhouses! Next year, she could even 
surpass Rudolph! What a colossal victory!

text_block_list.name: Caster
text_block_list.text:
An amazing racer was born today! Not even those in the senior year 
can match her!

text_block_list.name: Caster
text_block_list.text: Narita Brian has become a Five Crown Champion!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: Really… She shook off all her would-be rivals.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: Waaah! You're getting another phone call…

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text: Another interview request? How many is that now?!
It's been like this since the Arima Kinen… Yes, hello?

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: That race really had an effect on her popularity…

text_block_list.name: Tazuna Hayakawa
text_block_list.text:
Pardon me! The calls from journalists won't stop—they want to speak 
with Narita Brian…

Brian continues to amaze me, both on the course and with the 
reaction she's garnered…

Brian continues to amaze me, both on the course and with the 
reaction she's garnered…

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text: And just where is the ravenous rascal herself at a time like this?!
